entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Donald, here you are talking abt #coronavirus as a real thing you are fighting against. Yet at yr SC rally last night, you suddenly began calling it a hoax that Dems/media dreamed up. Which is it?
No worries. We know you are the #LiarInChief & you've told 15,000+ lies in office.
